resources.string: First of all, Please Select one MediaServer.

Media includes audio tracks, but none are playable by this device

IMA does not support offline ads

This is an open source software under MIT license.
 1,Download SnyMediaServer from www.streamingnology.com to your PC and run it.
 2,Make sure this device and SnyMediaServer connect to the same router.
 3,Goback to Search page, App will automatically find SnyMediaServer.
 If app can't find SnyMediaServer, you can try turnoff you device's WI-FI and turn WI-FI on
